title: polyA RNA-seq of Montipora capitata: 6_1phf
design_description: 50-100 ng of total RNA was used as input for the Zymo-Seq SwitchFree 3’ mRNA Library Kit (R3008) with 21 amplification cycles (95°C for 30 seconds, 58°C for 30 seconds, 72°C for 60 seconds). Library concentration and size was determined with an Agilent Tapestation 4200. The libraries were sequenced at the Oklahoma Medical Research Foundation NSG Core on an Illumina NovaSeq X Plus in a 2x150 bp configuration.
